items.title: "It is not about whether the message is political or not. It is about applying the rules equally to any form of messaging,"
"Het IOC heeft niet de sporter schade berokkend, maar zijn eigen reputatie. Toekomstige generaties zullen dit herinneren als een beschamend moment"

"We put out our very best skates every time we took Olympic ice," "All four performances we had here at the Olympics, we’re very proud of. They were flawless for us. We couldn’t have skated any better, and we’re super proud with how we took the ice, how we handled ourselves every time. The rest is out of our hands"
"un momento muy hermoso y emotivo en la vida de mi padre"
"Es geht nicht um die Botschaft, es geht um die Unantastbarkeit des Spielfelds"
